title: Sneaky Kaid Electroclaw Placements
description: **Kaid's Electroclaws** have a large radius that can be exploited for hidden placements. Use this to your advantage by placing them in unexpected spots that attackers won't check. This increases the chances of catching attackers off-guard and denying them entry.

counterStrategies: Thatcher's EMP grenades can disable Electroclaws
IQ can detect Electroclaws through walls
